productName: Man mast magan, Bas tera naam dohraye
description: Lorem ipsum, in graphical and textual context, refers to filler text that is placed in a document or visual presentation. Lorem ipsum is derived from the Latin dolorem ipsum roughly translated as pain itself.

creatorsData.name: Nagraj Manjule
creatorsData.desc: Jhund is able to prosper long after the film’s release because of the ingenuity of Blockchain Technology. Now, Jhund fans can own their own piece of our film and hold onto it for many years to come through the power of NFTs. We are so excited about this partnership and can’t wait to explore our collaborations in the future.
